statements: SELECT * FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, creation_date FROM helpdesk_tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed' AND creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_status FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Closed' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE creation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND creation_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM helpdesk_tickets WHERE ticket_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, creation_date, resolution_date FROM tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, creation_date FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT t.customer_name, c.commenter_name, c.comment_text FROM tickets t INNER JOIN ticket_comments c ON t.ticket_id = c.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_text, commenter_name FROM ticket_comments WHERE comment_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, status FROM tickets ORDER BY status ASC, ticket_id DESC;
SELECT tickets.ticket_id, tickets.customer_name, ticket_comments.commenter_name FROM tickets LEFT JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, title, description, created_at FROM tickets WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%London%';
SELECT title, status, created_at FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT t.title, r.reply_text FROM tickets t JOIN replies r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id WHERE t.status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, status FROM Tickets WHERE status = 'open';

SELECT customer_name, ticket_description, agent_name FROM Customers JOIN Tickets ON Customers.customer_id = Tickets.customer_id JOIN TicketAssignments ON Tickets.ticket_id = TicketAssignments.ticket_id JOIN Agents ON TicketAssignments.agent_id = Agents.agent_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT agent_name, department FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.ticket_description, a.agent_name FROM Tickets t JOIN TicketAssignments ta ON t.ticket_id = ta.ticket_id JOIN Agents a ON ta.agent_id = a.agent_id
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT agent_name, email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.issue_description, c.comment_text FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_comments c ON t.ticket_id = c.ticket_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, t.issue_description, a.agent_name FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN ticket_assignments ta ON t.ticket_id = ta.ticket_id JOIN agents a ON ta.agent_id = a.agent_id WHERE t.status='Closed';
